title: Tommaso：MCPE的一些小改动
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-5-17 11:45 编辑 







@_tomcc
And the new create world screen is there! It only has 3 options for now though, there's no time for the Far Biome. pic.twitter.com/xyUOnWoxDq
还有这就是新的创建世界页面！现在只有3个选项了，来不及做"边缘土地''（Far Biome）这个选项。pic.twitter.com/xyUOnWoxDq

@_tomcc
And the good old borders are back, I'm sure everyone missed them! At least you'll get them on old phones only, now.
以及那个旧边界回来了，我会相信大家都很怀念它！至少现在你的旧手机会【撑得住】。

@_tomcc
Oh, with "old phones" I mean stuff with a single core CPU and less than 512 mb of RAM! Check your specs :)
对了，那个“旧手机”的意思是只有单核CPU和只有512mb的内存【的手机】！检查你的手机配置吧！:)











看来我的诺基亚3310带不动MC了...
感谢 Craft Lawrence & 紫枫 提出翻译指导
